results.title: Eye Drops of Metformin Prevents Fibrosis After Glaucoma Filtration Surgery in Rats via Activating AMPK/Nrf2 Signaling Pathway
results.text_hl: Here, the @<m>DISEASE_Peroneal_Neuropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020427 @@@eye drop@@@ of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment was studied in Sprague-Dawley (SD) @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ of @DISEASE_Glaucoma @DISEASE_MESH:D005901 @@@glaucoma@@@ filtrating surgery (GFS).

citations.NLM: Li X, Leng Y, Jiang Q, Wang Z, Luo P, Zhang C, Chen L, Wang Y, Wang H, Yue X, Shen C, Zhou Y, Shi C, Xie L. Eye Drops of Metformin Prevents Fibrosis After Glaucoma Filtration Surgery in Rats via Activating AMPK/Nrf2 Signaling Pathway Front Pharmacol. 2020;11():1038. PMID: 32903813

results.title: [Effect of dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitors on lipid metabolism in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus].
results.text_hl: Group 1 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ received @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@ 100 mg/day in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 2 g/day; Group 2 took @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 1.5-2 g/day.

citations.NLM: Ametov AS, Gusenbekova DG. [Effect of dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitors on lipid metabolism in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus]. Ter Arkh. 2014;86(8):85-9. PMID: 25306750
